name: London Town
recipe: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lassi Khara
recipe: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

name: Lassi Raita
recipe: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

name: Lemouroudji
recipe: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.

name: Lord And Lady
recipe: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Lassi - Sweet
recipe: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

name: Lassi - Mango
recipe: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

name: Limona Corona
recipe: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

name: Lady Love Fizz
recipe: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Long Island Tea
recipe: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Lone Tree Cooler
recipe: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Lone Tree Cocktail
recipe: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lazy Coconut Paloma
recipe: Mix the coconut liqueur (preferably tequila) with the grapefruit juice and top with soda water. Garnish with a large grapefruit slice against the inside of the glass.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
recipe: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.

name: Lassi - A South Indian Drink
recipe: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Lassi is one of the easiest things to make, and there are many ways of making it. Basically, it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest. Serve cold.

name: Melya
recipe: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.

name: Mojito
recipe: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

name: Mimosa
recipe: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

name: Mai Tai
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

name: Martini
recipe: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

name: Margarita
recipe: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

name: Manhattan
recipe: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

name: Michelada
recipe:
Mix the beer with tomato juice, freshly squeezed lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, or hot sauce.
Served In a chilled, salt-rimmed glass

name: Miami Vice
recipe: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

name: Mudslinger
recipe: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

name: Moranguito
recipe: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

name: Mint Julep
recipe: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Martinez 2
recipe:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice.

Stir until chilled, and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Masala Chai
recipe: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

name: Mulled Wine
recipe: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

name: Moscow Mule
recipe: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

name: Mocha-Berry
recipe: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

name: Munich Mule
recipe:
Fill glass with ice
Pour Gin and Lime Juice
Fill glass with Ginger Beer
Garnish with Cucumer and Lime slice

name: Mojito Extra
recipe: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

name: Monkey Gland
recipe: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Monkey Wrench
recipe: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Midnight Manx
recipe: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!

name: Mother's Milk
recipe: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

name: Midnight Mint
recipe: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.

name: Mary Pickford
recipe: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

name: Negroni
recipe: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

name: New York Sour
recipe: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.

name: Nutty Irishman
recipe: Serve over ice

name: National Aquarium
recipe: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

name: New York Lemonade
recipe: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

name: Nuked Hot Chocolate
recipe: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.

name: Orgasm
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Old Pal
recipe: Chill cocktail glass. Add ingredients to a mixing glass, and fill 2/3 full with ice. Stir about 20 seconds. Empty cocktail glass and strain into the glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Orangeade
recipe: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

name: Orange Whip
recipe: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

name: Orange Oasis
recipe: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Orange Crush
recipe: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

name: Old Fashioned
recipe:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

name: Oreo Mudslide
recipe: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Orange Push-up
recipe: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

name: Oatmeal Cookie
recipe:
Just mix it all together.
It's meant to be a shot, but it works just fine as a proper adult-sized drink over lots of ice.

Tastes like an oatmeal cookie.

name: Orange Rosemary Collins
recipe: Add the spirits to the bottom of the glass and top equally with the mixer drinks. Garnish with orange slices inside the glass as well as some rosemary on top.

name: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
recipe: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

name: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge
recipe: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

name: Paloma
recipe: Stir together and serve over ice.

name: Pink Gin
recipe: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

name: Paradise
recipe: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

name: Pink Lady
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pegu Club
recipe: Shake, strain, up, cocktail glass

name: Pisco Sour
recipe: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.

name: Porto flip
recipe: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

name: Penicillin
recipe: Shake blended Scotch, lemon juice, honey syrup and ginger syrup with ice. Strain over large ice in chilled rocks glass. Float smoky Scotch on top (be sure to use a smoky Scotch such as an Islay single malt). Garnish with candied ginger.

name: Pina Colada
recipe: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

name: Pink Penocha
recipe: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

name: Pure Passion
recipe: Mix up all ingredients with a cocktail stirrer and serve with crushed ice with mint and edible flour if available.

name: Popped cherry
recipe: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

name: Poppy Cocktail
recipe: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Port Wine Flip
recipe: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Planter's Punch
recipe: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

name: Pineapple Paloma
recipe:
Rub the rim of each glass with lime slice and dip into salt.
Add ice, tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice and top with pineapple soda.
Give it a quick stir.
Garnish with fresh pineapple or lime.

name: Port And Starboard
recipe: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

name: Port Wine Cocktail
recipe: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pysch Vitamin Light
recipe: Shake with ice.

name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
recipe: Shake well

name: Passion Fruit Martini
recipe: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir. Garnish with half a passion fruit piece.

name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
recipe: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Quentin
recipe: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Queen Bee
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Quick F**K
recipe: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

name: Quick-sand
recipe: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

name: Queen Charlotte
recipe: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

name: Queen Elizabeth
recipe: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Quaker's Cocktail
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
recipe: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Rose
recipe: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

name: Radler
recipe: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

name: Rum Sour
recipe: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Rum Toddy
recipe: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Rum Punch
recipe: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

name: Royal Fizz
recipe: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

name: Rum Cooler
recipe: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Rusty Nail
recipe: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Rum Runner
recipe: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

name: Rum Cobbler
recipe: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

name: Red Snapper
recipe: One shot each, shake n shoot

name: Royal Flush
recipe: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

name: Royal Bitch
recipe: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

name: Ruby Tuesday
recipe: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

name: Rail Splitter
recipe: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

name: Rosemary Blue
recipe:
1) Add the Bombay Sapphire, Blue Curacao, rosemary sprig and gently squeezed lemon wedge to a balloon glass. Swirl well to combine.
2) Fill with cubed ice and top with the Fever-Tree Light Tonic Water.
3) Gently fold with a bar spoon to mix.

name: Royal Gin Fizz
recipe: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Rum Milk Punch
recipe: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Raspberry Julep
recipe: Softly muddle the mint leaves and raspberry syrup in the bottom of the cup. Add crushed ice and Bourbon to the cup and then stir. Top with more ice, garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Rum Screwdriver
recipe: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Raspberry Cooler
recipe: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Rum Old-fashioned
recipe: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

name: Russian Spring Punch
recipe: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
recipe: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

name: Smut
recipe: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

name: Spritz
recipe: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

name: Sazerac
recipe: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

name: Scooter
recipe: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sidecar
recipe: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Sangria
recipe: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Stinger
recipe: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

name: Snowday
recipe: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice. Express orange peel over drink and garnish.

name: Snowball
recipe: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

name: Shot-gun
recipe: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

name: Spice 75
recipe:
Gently warm 60g golden caster sugar in a pan with 30ml water and 1 tbsp allspice. Cook gently until the sugar has dissolved, then leave the mixture to cool. Strain through a sieve lined with a coffee filter (or a double layer of kitchen paper).

Pour 60ml of the spiced syrup into a cocktail shaker along with 200ml rum and 90ml lime juice. Shake with ice and strain between six flute glasses. Top up with 600ml champagne and garnish each with an orange twist.

name: Salty Dog
recipe: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

name: Stone Sour
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Sea breeze
recipe: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Scotch Sour
recipe: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Screwdriver
recipe: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

name: Sherry Flip
recipe: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Sweet Tooth
recipe: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

name: Sol Y Sombra
recipe: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

name: Shark Attack
recipe: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

name: Sherry Eggnog
recipe: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Sweet Bananas
recipe: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

name: Sweet Sangria
recipe: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.

name: San Francisco
recipe: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

name: Space Odyssey
recipe: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

name: Thriller
recipe: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Tia-Maria
recipe: Boil water, sugar and coffe for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

name: Tipperary
recipe: Stir over ice. Strain into chilled glass. Cut a wide swath of orange peel, and express the orange oils over the drink. Discard orange twist.

name: The Galah
recipe: Mix together the alcoholic portions and top with Pineapple and Lime juice.

name: Turkeyball
recipe: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Tom Collins
recipe: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Tomato Tang
recipe: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

name: Thai Coffee
recipe: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.

name: Texas Sling
recipe: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

name: Tequila Fizz
recipe: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Tequila Sour
recipe: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Talos Coffee
recipe: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

name: Tennesee Mud
recipe: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

name: Turf Cocktail
recipe: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Thai Iced Tea
recipe: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

name: The Last Word
recipe: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: The Laverstoke
recipe:
1) Squeeze two lime wedges into a balloon glass then add the cordial, Bombay Sapphire and MARTINI Rosso Vermouth, swirl to mix.

2) Fully fill the glass with cubed ice and stir to chill.

3) Top with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale and gently stir again to combine.

4) Garnish with a snapped ginger slice and an awoken mint sprig.

name: Tuxedo Cocktail
recipe: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

name: Tequila Sunrise
recipe: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.

name: Tequila Slammer
recipe: Mix carefully to avoid releasing the dissolved CO2.

name: The Philosopher
recipe: Add all the spirits in a shaker (best to use Hendricks gin) as well as the orange bitters and lemon juice. Strain into a Margarita glass, top with Prosecco.

name: Thai Iced Coffee
recipe: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee, add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot, then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice, with cream. To get the layered effect, place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.

name: Tequila Surprise
recipe: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

name: The Jimmy Conway
recipe:
Fill glass with ice
Pour in The Irishman and Disaronno
Fill to the top with Cranberry Juice
Garnish with a slice of lemonEnjoy!

name: Texas Rattlesnake
recipe: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...

name: Victor
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Vesper
recipe: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

name: Vesuvio
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Veteran
recipe: Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Vampiro
recipe: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.

name: Van Vleet
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Vodka Fizz
recipe: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Vodka Martini
recipe: Shake the vodka and vermouth together with a number of ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive and serve.

name: Vodka Russian
recipe: Mix it as a ordinary drink .

name: Vermouth Cassis
recipe: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

name: Victory Collins
recipe: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Vodka And Tonic
recipe: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

name: Valencia Cocktail
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Whisky Mac
recipe: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

name: Wine Punch
recipe: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

name: White Lady
recipe: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

name: Wine Cooler
recipe: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

name: Winter Rita
recipe: Salt rim. Combine all ingredients, shake with ice, and strain over fresh ice.

name: Whiskey Sour
recipe: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

name: White Russian
recipe: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

name: Winter Paloma
recipe: Everyones favourite Paloma gets a delicious Indian makeover. Tequila reposado infused with Timur Pepper which has citrusy & grapefruit notes and is grown at the foothills of Himalaya. It also produces a slightly numbing and tingling sensation on your lip when consumed. We have also spiced up the fresh grapefruit juice with the warming spice blend from Himalaya. The combination of all these interesting elements has allowed us to elevate your Paloma sipping experience.

name: Whitecap Margarita
recipe: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

name: White Wine Sangria
recipe: Chop the Lemon, Lime and other fruits into large chunks. Fill the Pitcher with the white wine and mix in the Apple Brandy. Top to taste with soda water.

name: Waikiki Beachcomber
recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Yellow Bird
recipe: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Yoghurt Cooler
recipe: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up. Note: Use lots of ice in this one - great on hot days! To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.

name: Zorro
recipe: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.

name: Zinger
recipe: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.

name: Zoksel
recipe: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.

name: Zombie
recipe:
Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds.

Pour into a glass, add ice cubes to fill, then add the garnish.

*Donns mix: Bring 3 crushed cinnamon sticks, 1 cup of sugar and 1 cup of water to a boil, stirring until the sugar is dissolved.

Simmer for 2 minutes, then remove from the heat and let sit for at least 2 hours before straining into a clean glass bottle.

Then add 1 part of the syrup and 2 parts of fresh grapefruit juice together.

name: Zambeer
recipe: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

name: Zorbatini
recipe: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

name: Zenmeister
recipe: Mix together and enjoy

name: Zipperhead
recipe: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

name: Zima Blaster
recipe: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

name: Zizi Coin-coin
recipe: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

name: Zippy's Revenge
recipe: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

name: Zimadori Zinger
recipe: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
recipe: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.

name: 155 Belmont
recipe: Blend with ice. Serve in a wine glass. Garnish with carrot.

name: 1-900-FUK-MEUP
recipe: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a rocks glass.

name: 110 in the shade
recipe: Drop shooter in glass. Fill with beer

name: 151 Florida Bushwacker
recipe: Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.
Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick

name: 24k nightmare
recipe: Add over ice,shake and pour.

name: 3 Wise Men
recipe: put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.

name: 3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea
recipe: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.
fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

name: 501 Blue
recipe: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.

name: 57 Chevy with a White License Plate
recipe: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir

name: 69 Special
recipe: Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.
pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

name: 747 Drink
recipe:
Fill a Collins glass with ice.
Pour in vodka, lime cordial, and cranberry juice.
Fill up with Sprite.
Garnish with a Lime wheel or some cranberries

name: 9 1/2 Weeks
recipe: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer. Chill and strain into Cocktail glass. Garnish with sliced strawberry.
